scenario_text.value:
(It’s obvious how screwy things are between
Shuuji and Lopmon, even from the outside.)
(I wonder if Kaito and Dracmon are good?)
I wonder what Miu’s up to right about now...
That’s the fifth time, man.
Huh? Fifth time what?

The fifth time you said that! You got some
kinda complex or what?

Word? You got something against a brother
worrying about his sister?

Hee hee, don’t blow a gasket. That girl’s the
biggest button you got to push.

See what happens when you do, punk. You won’t
have teeth to smirk with when I’m through.
Come on, Kaito, he’s just messing with you.

And you, Dracmon, you know that’s not
something Kaito wants to joke about.

Oh, looks like you’ve gotten to know my boy
pretty well, Takuma! Nice, very nice.

Who’s getting to know who? Don’t act like you
know a damn thing.
*sigh* He’s glaring again...

(It’s true, I still don’t know anything about
Kaito.)

(I feel like he cares a bit too much for his
sister. Could there be a reason?)

(Did something happen in their past? Hmm,
I wonder if I can ask...)

(Or should I ask what he likes about her?
He’d probably enjoy talking about her.)
(What should I ask Kaito about?)
You care a lot...
Did something happen?
What he likes about Miu.

Why do you care so much about your sister,
Kaito?

’Scuse me? Whaddaya mean, “so much”? Anyone
would care as much as I do.

Uh, I’d say you’re on the high side of the
care spectrum.

(More like off the charts. Still, can’t say
that or that’s the end of our conversation.)
I mean...
Hmph. It’s not like I have a special reason.

I said it before, didn’t I? What’s wrong with
a brother worrying about his sister?
I see...

(It seems like he stopped himself from saying
something? Maybe it’s a hard topic for him.)

(If so, I can’t just force him to talk to me
about it.)
Did something happen in the past?
What?!

And like, maybe that’s why you worry about
Miu so much?
Tch...

Even if there was something, why would I have
to tell you about it?
Oh, uh... Guess you wouldn’t.

(No good. If I push any harder, I get the
feeling he’ll slug me.)
Hey, Kaito. What do you like about Miu?
What? The hell’re you asking me for?

You trying to tell me...you got a crush on
her or something? You sonuva—

Whoa, whoa, you’ve got the wrong idea! I was
just making conversation!

(If that’s how he reacts to a simple
question, I worry for Miu’s future...)

Hmph, fine then. What do I like about her,
then? Let’s see...

First, there’s her looks. She’s small and
cute. Those slender arms make you wanna

protect her. Watch over her all day. Then you
got her cute eyes, just her looking up at you

makes you wanna hug her. Her mouth’s small,
so she nibbles like a hamster when she eats.

She acts cute, too, like a cat, all “leave me
alone” but then she gives you this look and—

Um, Kaito? I get it, that’s more than enough.
Thanks for talking.

Oh yeah? That’s just the tip of the iceberg,
but if you say so.
Wowzers, I never heard Kaito talk so much!
Right? Ain’t it something?
Yeah... Gotta say I didn’t expect that.
(This goes beyond brotherly affection...)
What, you doing a survey or something?

No, it’s just... I realized I don’t know
a thing about you.

Doesn’t matter. You don’t care about me,
anyway.
That’s not true.

We’re friends, man. If something’s bothering
you, we’re here to help.

Ah, not that you have to talk if you don’t
want to or anything.
...That right? If you say so.
I may take you up on that sometime.
Sure... Anytime, man.

A brother always worries about his sister.
Ain’t nothing weird about that.
